mean_cn: 不停的劳碌奔波；商业上竞争
mean_en: rat race=the way of life of people living and working in a large city where people compete in an aggressive way with each other in order to be more successful, earn more money, etc.
sentence: In the rat race, I'm chasing after time all day long.
sentence_trans: 在忙碌的生活中，我从早到晚都在追赶时间。
